name: Dark Star
description:
Unfinished. Not much to this one, just a room and the mechanics.

--------------

Qt the artificial being awakens to find herself on a sprawling megastructure. A dark energy star radiates in the distance.

Controls:

Anykey = Advance past title screen
Dpad/wasd/arrows = Move
Abutton/X/K = Jump
Bbutton/Z/J = Attack
R = Restart

Character Actions:
Dash: Double tap in desired direction
Divekick: Down+B in the air
Slide: Down while running on the ground
Walljump
Double jump
Deflect Bullets(maybe)

Originally created for GBJam3.

Thanks for checking it out.
